statement.p: In 44 of the last 25 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{25}}={0.44}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{25}. \displaystyle{P}={0.44}\cdot{25}={11}. We round that as requested to 11 to find the days it rained. How many days did it NOT rain?
